responseText: Varnok! Aye! A name that should be sung in the same breath as our greatest ancestors! While others were content to simply beat metal into shape, Varnok conversed with it, wove enchantments into its very essence! His forge... ah, it wasn't just a place of fire and hammers, but a crucible of creation where he sought to bind the very elements to his will!
name: ANV_FTUE_HR_Bindur_6_Response
